dialogue:
[header name:Wise Veteran]
There are two types of cards, 
[color value:blue]arts[color value:regular] 
and [color value:blue]widgets
[color value:regular].

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Wise Veteran]
Art cards produce an [color value:blue]
immediate effect[color value:regular] but 
Widgets are different.

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Wise Veteran]
You'll get a [color value:blue]lasting effect
[color value:regular] or 
[color value:blue]equipment
[color value:regular].

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Wise Veteran]
Be careful though, because widgets may have 
a [color value:blue]limited number of charges 
[color value:regular].
name: Veteran 1
